detail_desc: Calf-length dress in a crinkled weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck, and flounces at the front that continue over the shoulders and down the back. Elasticated seam and tie belt below the bust, and a double layer at the front with deep armholes and a wrapover lining for easier nursing access. Lined.
Shirt in a striped viscose weave with a grandad collar, French front and pleat at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Fitted strappy top in soft organic cotton jersey.
Pull-on trousers in soft, washed cotton denim with elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist, fake front pockets and elasticated hems.
Jumper in a cotton knit with a round, ribbed neckline and contrasting colour ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Sturdy hat in felted wool with a band. Width of brim 7 cm.
Dungaree dress in stretch cotton corduroy with adjustable straps with metal fasteners, front pockets, back pockets and press-studs at the sides.
Shoe boots with elastic gores in the sides, pointed toes and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel approx. 4.5 cm.
Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a narrow collar, buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Cap sleeves and a rounded hem.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft cotton jersey with a decorative scalloped trim around the neckline and armholes, and press-studs at the crotch.
Joggers in soft, double-weave organic cotton with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, open leg pockets and elasticated hems.
Vest top in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned viscose weave with a resort collar, buttons down the front, a chest pocket and short slits in the sides.
Trousers in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Knee-length football shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and a print motif on one leg. Unlined.

Fully lined shaping swimsuit that has a sculpting effect on the tummy, back and bum. Wrapover top, lightly padded cups, support panels, decorative gathers in the sides, and adjustable shoulder straps.
Thin metal chain necklace decorated with small, coin-shaped pendants and rod-shaped metal beads. Adjustable length 40-48 cm.
Microfibre Brazilian briefs with laser-cut edges, a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and legs that flare at the hem.
Calf-length, sleeveless dress in a patterned weave with an elasticated frill trim at the top, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a seam with a flare to the hem. Unlined.
T-shirts in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Skirt in a viscose weave with a smocked waist and broderie anglaise at the hem. Unlined.
Top in woven fabric with a lace section at the top in a relaxed fit with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.

Short dress in a viscose weave with a small stand-up collar and V-neck opening at the top. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.

Jacket in hard-washed denim with worn details and metal studs. Shoulder tabs and lapels with press-studs, a diagonal zip down the front, zipped side pockets and a small flap front pocket with a press-stud. Adjustable tabs with a press-stud at the sides and a press-stud at the cuffs. The jacket has been treated to give it a used, slightly dirty look. These effects mean that the appearance of each jacket may vary.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Short-sleeved blouse in an airy weave with a round neckline and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the jacket is organic.

Jumpsuit in woven fabric with notch lapels and a wrapover front with a concealed press-stud. Defined shoulders, long sleeves and diagonal side pockets with a recycled polyester lining. Seam with a tie belt and button at the waist, a zip fly and straight, ankle-length legs with creases.
Blouse in woven fabric with a pointed collar, scalloped button band, long sleeves with wide buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Warm-lined ankle boots in imitation suede with elastic gores in the sides, block heels and a loop at the back. Faux fur linings and insoles and chunky soles. Heel 7.5 cm.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with a V-neck front and back with ties at the back of the neck and long trumpet sleeves.
Dress in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend containing glittery threads with a ribbed neckline, sewn-on bow at the top and short sleeves.
Short, sleeveless jersey dress with a V-neck at the back and seam at the waist with a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Short, gently fitted dungaree dress in stretch denim with buttons down the front, wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a seam at the waist with patch pockets. Unlined.
Twill cap with an appliqué on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and a motif.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist and raw-edge sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Jacquard-knit socks in a cotton blend with elasticated, roll-edge tops.
Hipster briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Boys' briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined front.
Short dress in cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and short cap sleeves. Unlined.

Softshell jacket in water-repellent functional fabric. Hood with an elastic drawstring and small peak, and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Chest pocket with a zip and earphone outlet on the inside, zipped side pockets, elastication at the cuffs and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Thermal fleece inside. Size of chest pocket approx. 12x17 cm.
High-waisted shorts in superstretch twill with back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Patterned swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Cardigan in a soft bouclé knit made from a wool blend with a hood and no buttons.

Fleece-lined jacket in water-repellent functional fabric with a detachable, lined hood and stand-up collar. Zip down the front with a chin guard, front pockets, a zipped chest pocket and covered elastication at the cuffs and hem. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Short, off-the-shoulder dress in soft organic cotton jersey with short sleeves.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Top in airy chiffon with pin-tucks, and wide, gathered shoulder straps in a double layer with a contrasting colour, raw-edge cotton weave. Lacing with grosgrain ribbon at the top and frills at the hem in contrasting fabrics.

Ankle-length suit trousers in a linen blend with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button and legs with creases. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Calf-length circular skirt in woven fabric with a high waist and a concealed button and zip at one side. Unlined.
Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and rounded hem. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand.

Short dress in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend. Relaxed fit with a slightly wider neckline, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist, and a rounded hem.

Jersey body in a loose fit at the top with notch lapels and a wrapover front with a concealed press-stud. Dropped shoulders, long, tapered sleeves, a seam at the waist and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Cigarette trousers in woven fabric with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered, ankle-length legs with creases.
Mules with crossover fabric straps and rubber soles.
Sleeveless dress in printed cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Long-sleeved, straight-cut blouse in printed woven fabric with a slightly wider neckline and buttoned cuffs. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, wrapover, jersey-lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Plastic hair claws. Width 3.5 cm.

Microfibre T-shirt bra with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Without visible seams for greater comfort.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Swim shorts in a patterned weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Mesh inner shorts.
Chelsea boots with elastic gores in the sides and a loop front and back. Fabric linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles. Height of soles 5 cm.
Nursing bra in soft microfibre with opening, cotton-lined cups with space for nursing pads. Adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back.
Top and pair of shorts in soft, brushed jersey. Top with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. Shorts with an elasticated waist and side pockets.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket, contrasting colour stripes down the sides and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Cotton corduroy shirt with a collar, buttons down the front, a chest pocket and narrow, buttoned cuffs.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with elastication and a press-stud at the waist and fake front pockets with zips.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Sleeveless dress in organic cotton jersey with a seam at the hips and flared skirt.
Hat knitted in a soft cotton blend with ear flaps and ties under the chin. Fleece lining.
Soft velour bootees with embroidery and appliqués, foldover ribbing at the top and jersey linings. Soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
Fine-knit socks with a scalloped edge.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Regular waist with a concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Sleeveless, V-neck dress in woven fabric with decorative knot details, gathers at the shoulders and an elasticated seam under the bust with ties. Satin lining.

Imitation leather biker jacket with shoulder tabs, notch lapels with a press-stud, and a diagonal zip down the front. Long sleeves with quilted sections, elastication on the underside of the sleeves, a zipped chest pocket, zipped side pockets and an inner pocket. Lined.

Trousers in cotton twill. Casual style in a relaxed fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist. Diagonal side pockets, flap leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening, and fake back pockets. Tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Henley top in soft cotton jersey with a decorative button placket and one chest pocket. Longer layer of fabric in a contrasting colour at the cuffs and hem.
